project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns from a CSV file.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement functionality to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for the implemented data analysis functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
